Introduction to Concepts

Hello kids let us learn some basic concepts in english. Let's get started.

1. big and small



2. long and short



3. tall and short



4. dry and wet



5. few and many



6. in and out



7. empty and full



8. light and dark



9. give and take



10. start and finish



11. push and pull



12. up and down



13. hot and cold



14. clean and dirty



15. day and night



16. happy and sad



17. poor and rich



18. fast and slow



19. old and young



20. close and open



21. sick and healthy



22. light and heavy



23. sit and stand



24. sleep and awake



25. man and woman



26. laugh and cry



27. soft and hard



28. thin and fat



29. good and bad



30. black and white



31. front and back



32. loud and quiet



33. left and right



34. same and different



35. low and high



36. near and far



37. strong and weak



38. brave and coward



39. in front and behind



40. love and hate



41. yes and no



42. new and old



43. smooth and rough



44. safe and unsafe



45. sweet and sour



46. buy and sell



47. sharp and blunt



48. straight and curved



49. bright and dim



50. Transparent and opaque





The content is created for easy understanding of the concepts. The language and font may differ from the books available in the market.
